00037 #ifndef __GRASP_PLANNER_H__
00038 #define __GRASP_PLANNER_H__
00039 
00040 /* Starting distance is the (double) distance, in which
00041    the hand is placed acc to the object before grasping. 
00042    The distance is measured from the surface of the object. */
00043 #define STARTING_DISTANCE 80.0
00044 
00045 /* When grasping an axially symmetric object, the 360degrees
00046    are approximated with NR_OF_360_DEG_STEPS steps. 
00047    This must be an even number, because the 180 degrees of
00048    teta (spherical coordinate space) are approximated
00049    with NR_OF_360_DEG_STEPS/2. */
00050 #define NR_OF_360_DEG_STEPS 2
00051 
00052 /* For a cylinder side grasp or a cube grasp, grasps may be 
00053    generated in different planes. If this number is even,
00054    the middle plane won't be used (so you probably should 
00055    give an odd number) */
00056 #define NR_OF_PARALLEL_PLANES 1
00057 
00058 /* When you grasp a cylinder or a cube from one side, you have
00059    2 possibilities, turned 180 deg to each other. If you want to
00060    try both of them (they are very similar), set this define to
00061    2, else to 1. */
00062 #define NR_OF_180_DEG_GRASPS 1
00063 
00064 /* Cylinder from the top or sphere grasp: Try NR_OF_GRASP_ROTATIONS
00065    different palm z rotations */
00066 #define NR_OF_GRASP_ROTATIONS 1
00067 
00068 /* Parameter mode is described within the class definition */
00069 #define DEFAULT_PARAMETER_MODE 2
00070 
00071 /* Maximum and minimum object sizes for grasping primitives. 
00072    All values in mm. */
00073 
00074 /* Prim: Cube
00075    Presh: PRESHAPE_CUBE_GRASP */
00076 #define GP_MAX_CUBE_SIZE 200.0
00077 #define GP_MIN_CUBE_SIZE 0.0
00078 
00079 /* Prim: Cylinder
00080    Presh: PRESHAPE_CYLINDER_SIDE_GRASP
00081    Thumb dir: phi */
00082 #define GP_MAX_CYL_SIDEGRASP_DIAMETER 180.0
00083 #define GP_MIN_CYL_SIDEGRASP_DIAMETER 0.0
00084 #define GP_MIN_CYL_SIDEGRASP_HEIGHT 28.0
00085 /* Prim: Cylinder
00086    Presh: PRESHAPE_CYLINDER_SIDE_GRASP
00087    Thumb dir: z */
00088 #define GP_MAX_CYL_SIDEGRASP_HEIGHT 200.0
00089    
00090 /* Prim: Cylinder
00091    Presh: PRESHAPE_CYLINDER_TOP_BOTTOM_GRASP
00092    Thumb dir: R */
00093 #define GP_MAX_CYL_TBGRASP_DIAMETER 180.0
00094 #define GP_MIN_CYL_TBGRASP_DIAMETER 5.0
00095 #define GP_MIN_CYL_TBGRASP_HEIGHT 40.0
00096 
00097 /* Prim: Sphere
00098    Presh: PRESHAPE_SPHERE_GRASP
00099    Thumb dir: perp. to r */
00100 #define GP_MAX_SPH_DIAMETER 180.0
00101 #define GP_MIN_SPH_DIAMETER   0.0
00102 
00103 /* Prim: Cone
00104    Presh: PRESHAPE_CONE_TOP_BOTTOM_GRASP; from TOP
00105    Thumb dir: R */
00106 #define GP_MAX_CONE_TGRASP_DIAMETER 100000.0
00107 #define GP_MIN_CONE_TGRASP_DIAMETER 5.0
00108 #define GP_MIN_CONE_TGRASP_HEIGHT   0.0
00109 /* Prim: Cone
00110    Presh: PRESHAPE_CONE_TOP_BOTTOM_GRASP; from BOTTOM
00111    Thumb dir: R */
00112 #define GP_MAX_CONE_BGRASP_DIAMETER 180.0
00113 #define GP_MIN_CONE_BGRASP_DIAMETER 5.0
00114 #define GP_MIN_CONE_BGRASP_HEIGHT   0.0
00115 /* Prim: Cone
00116    Presh: PRESHAPE_CONE_SIDE_GRASP
00117    Thumb dir: phi */
00118 #define GP_MAX_CONE_SIDEGRASP_DIAMETER 100000.0
00119 #define GP_MIN_CONE_SIDEGRASP_DIAMETER 0.0
00120 #define GP_MIN_CONE_SIDEGRASP_HEIGHT 0.0
00121 /* Prim: Cone
00122    Presh: PRESHAPE_CONE_SIDE_GRASP
00123    Thumb dir: z */
00124 #define GP_MAX_CONE_SIDEGRASP_HEIGHT 100000.0
00125 /* Prim: Cone
00126    Presh: PRESHAPE_CONE_EDGE_GRASP
00127    Thumb dir: phi */
00128 #define GP_MAX_CONE_EDGEGRASP_DIAMETER 180.0
00129 #define GP_MIN_CONE_EDGEGRASP_DIAMETER 0.0
00130 #define GP_MIN_CONE_EDGEGRASP_HEIGHT 28.0
00131 /* Prim: Cone
00132    Presh: PRESHAPE_CONE_EDGE_GRASP
00133    Thumb dir: z */
00134 #define GP_MAX_CONE_EDGEGRASP_HEIGHT 100000.0
00135 
00136 
00137 
00138 /* Grasp preshapes for existing primitives */
00139 #define PRESHAPE_CUBE_GRASP                PR_two_opp_one 
00140 #define PRESHAPE_CYLINDER_TOP_BOTTOM_GRASP PR_circle
00141 #define PRESHAPE_CYLINDER_SIDE_GRASP       PR_two_opp_one
00142 #define PRESHAPE_SPHERE_GRASP              PR_circle
00143 #define PRESHAPE_CONE_TOP_BOTTOM_GRASP     PR_circle
00144 #define PRESHAPE_CONE_SIDE_GRASP           PR_two_opp_one
00145 #define PRESHAPE_CONE_EDGE_GRASP           PR_two_opp_one
00146 
00147 /* When adding k times 2*pi/k, you won't end up
00148    with 2*pi but with 2*pi-delta. This defines 
00149    a threshold for delta. */
00150 #define DELTA_360_DEG_ERROR  0.0001

00208    corresponding definitions above. The values of these are 
00209    initially taken from the #defines, but may be changed
00210    by the user via the motif interface. */
00211 
00213   int nr_of_360_deg_steps;
00214 
00216   int nr_of_parallel_planes_width;
00217

00226

00230 /*
00231  * private methods
00232  */
00233 
00234   SoPathList searchPrimitives(GraspableBody*);
00235 
00236     /* Takes prasp list with local cartesian coordinates
00237        and changes these to global. */
00238     void localToGlobalCoordinates(std::list<plannedGrasp*>&,
00239                                   SoPath *,const transf &);
00240   
00241     /* Returns the global path
00242        of a given node */
00243     SoPath *getGlobalPath(SoNode *node);
00244 
00245     /* Compute all starting points and directions 
00246        from which the given primitive can be grasped.
00247        Does no collision detection. */
00248     std::list <plannedGrasp*>    getPlannedGraspDirections(SoPath*);
00249     /* Calls one of: */
00250     std::list <GraspDirection*> getCubeGraspDirections    (SoPath* sop);
00251     std::list <GraspDirection*> getCylinderGraspDirections(SoPath* sop);
00252     std::list <GraspDirection*> getSphereGraspDirections  (SoPath* sop);
00253     std::list <GraspDirection*> getConeGraspDirections    (SoPath* sop);
00254 
00255     /* Compute preshapes for all grasps in list that have
00256        implemented heuristics; return grasp list */
00257     void computeGraspPreshapes        (std::list<plannedGrasp*>&, SoPath*);
00258     /* Calls one or more of: */
00259     void computeCubeGraspPreshapes    (std::list<plannedGrasp*>&, SoPath*);
00260     void computeCylinderGraspPreshapes(std::list<plannedGrasp*>&, SoPath*);
00261     void computeSphereGraspPreshapes  (std::list<plannedGrasp*>&, SoPath*);
00262     void computeConeGraspPreshapes    (std::list<plannedGrasp*>&, SoPath*);
00263 
00264     /* helper for eliminating obsolete grasps which may occur if
00265        obj consists of several primitives */
00266     bool existsInList(plannedGrasp, std::list<plannedGrasp*>);
00267 
00268     /* this returns the number of grasps that will be planned. 
00269        If spheres are involved, this is only an estimate :-) */
00270     int determineNumberOfGrasps(SoPathList);
00271 
00272     /* If the planning parameters are set automatically, this method
00273        does it. The parameters depend on the parameterMode, the size
00274        and the shape of the primitive. */
00275     bool set_planningParametersFromPrimitive(SoPath*);
00276 
00277 public:
00278

00280  * constructor, destructor 
00281  */

00283     ~grasp_planner();
00284 
00285     /* this method calls all planning stuff */
00286     std::list<plannedGrasp*> planIt(GraspableBody*,SoGroup *);
00287 
00288     /* used by the motif interface */
00289     bool set_planningParameters(int nr_of_360_deg_steps_in, 
00290                                 int nr_of_parallel_planes_in,
